s1.title: Chapter I : The Alphabet, Combination of Syllables
Chapter II : Classification of Words, The First Declension, The Second Declension, The Third Declension, Recapitulatory, The Second Conjugation

Chapter III : Classification of Declinable Words, Nouns of Relationship-Pronouns, Uninflected Words, Relative Participles, Neuter Participial Nouns, Conditional Clauses, Adjectives and their Equivalents, Idiomatic Uses of ಆಗು agu-ಆಗಿ agi in Adverbial sense-ಆಯಿತು ayitu representing Completeness, Defective Verbs
